Methods : The ADEX Trial multicentre , single-blind , randomize clinical trial . Based power calculation investigator plan recruit 192 home-dwelling patient age 50-90 year mild moderate AD . The participant randomly allocate two group : An intervention group attend 16 week continuously supervise moderate aerobic exercise 1 hour three time week control group receive usual care .
